TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNamedNodeMap extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of nodes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `XmlNamedNodeMap` is returned by the following three properties.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> - Returns <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttributeCollection>, a class which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity> objects. The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
- <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing <xref:System.Xml.XmlNotation> objects. The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.

Docs.related: Unordered Node Retrieval by Name or Index

Docs.param: The index position of the node to retrieve from the . The index is zero-based; therefore, the index of the first node is 0 and the index of the last node is -1.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the node at the specified index in the .
Docs.returns: The at the specified index. If is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the property, is returned.
